VG_DESCRIPTION: Displays the list of a user's "Glows"
VG_SLASH_DESC1: Select a user to see display their "Glows"
VG_SLASH_DESC2: Provide the name of the "Tag" you want to filter for
VG_SLASH_DESC3: Provide the code of a "Glow" you want to inspect
NO_GLOWS: {{author}} Could not find any `Glows` for that user
EMBED_FOOTER: Use the command `{{prefix}}vg <GlowCode>` to inspect a `Glow` | Total `Glows`: {{count}}
NO_GLOWS_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any `Tag` with the name "**{{tagName}}**"
CANNOT_FIND_GLOW: {{author}} Could not find any `Glow` with the code `{{glowCode}}`
NAME: `Name:   ` ➜ {{name}}
